Excel 2014 gives equal importance to inculcating in the minds of young children, the importance of technical innovations. Innovations for a BEtter TOmorrow Junior (IBETO Jr) allows them to bring their ideas to reality. This is a competition aimed for school children aged 13-19 years. 
Out of the 100 entries received from all over the country, 25 projects have been shortlisted to be exhibited at Excel 2014 in September. They are provided with the technical expertise to complete the project and the best project wins INR 15,000. The runner up will win INR 5,000 and consolation prizes worth INR 10,000 to be won by all!!!
